text: Blessed Benefit is a 2016 internationally co-produced drama film directed by Mahmoud al Massad. It was selected to be screened in the Discovery section at the 2016 Toronto International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Mahmoud al Massad as Ibrahim * Odai Hijazi as Ahmad's Cousin * Ahmad Thaher as Ahmad ==References== ==External links== * Category:2016 films Category:2016 drama films Category:Jordanian films Category:German films Category:Dutch films Category:German drama films Category:Dutch drama films Category:Arabic- language films
title: Blessed Benefit
